title: 2021 Week 6 Preview
itunes:title: 2021 Week 6 Preview
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler preview each and every upcoming game of Week 6, starting with the primetime games and followed by our draft of the rest of the slate. The heroes, including the Wesseling Brothers, make their picks for lock of the week.

Around the NFL is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
